definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Our new student Residential College specially designed for the use of the UNSW Foundation Year is now open.
sentences.chinese: 專供新南威爾士大學預科使用的住宿區即將開放。

sentences.english: The White Mountain School curriculum is college preparatory and offers an honors program by department.
sentences.chinese: 懷德蒙特學校提供大學預科課程和榮譽課程。

sentences.english: Designed 1968 as a pre-university course of study with external examinations.
sentences.chinese: 創立於1968年，最初作爲大學預科測試的一部分。
